thread.title: Maureen Kenyon
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Maureen Kenyon

author: Maureen Kenyon
title: Maureen Kenyon
text: wonderful service on line or on the phone with excellent delivery. I always buy white mountain puzzles as they are sturdy and stay together. I also love that you get points and can get a free puzzle every now and then also the free shipping if you spend over $35.00 I will continue to buy them.
